name: Solident : Biometric Identity
description: Solident is a biometric-first wallet and identity layer built on Solana. It replaces traditional seed phrases and passwords with secure biometric verification, such as face recognition and pattern unlock. The project enables seamless authentication, wallet access, and DeFi participation through a privacy-preserving, zero-trust architecture where all sensitive data is encrypted and stored locally on the user’s device. Solident’s goal is to make Web3 more secure, human-verified, and accessible to everyone.
